answers.answer: My son takes erythocin for his gastroparesis.  He doesn't have diabetes either.  Eat smaller meals and try to stay away from foods that are harder to digest.Avoid fats.

question: My GP sent me for a CAT scan and the report say "poor emptying of stomach". I do not have diabetes and I have major weight gain and not loss. He has recommended a GI but my financial aide will not cover it. What else can be the cause and what treatments are there?
title: poor emptying
